| --- |
| other effective D-A type low - bandgap photovoltaic polymers |

However, since "hole mobility" is not a material but a property, I am providing the other valid entity "other effective D-A type low - bandgap photovoltaic polymers" as a Markdown table.

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| --- |
| other effective D-A type low - bandgap photovoltaic polymers |

In the given paragraph, there is only one clear material name, which is "other effective D-A type low - bandgap photovoltaic polymers." The other entity, "hole mobility," is a property, not a material. Therefore, I am providing the valid entity as a Markdown table.
